description: Atla is a young descendant of the people of Jamir. During all times, he stays with Hakurei until he is sent to the Sanctuary to inform that the Specters are being brought back to life by Hades. He is also tasked to teleport Athena`s large army into Hades` territory, as Sisyphos states his telekinesis ability can overpower that of Hakurei`s and Shion`s.
name: Alta
